Context:
The TLC (Tutoring and Learning Centre) at George Brown College is open for both in-person and online tutoring. Students can log in using their GBC credentials to book sessions. The centre welcomes feedback from students about their services, materials, and facilities which can be submitted through an online form. It is important to indicate the campus for any campus-specific feedback. For those seeking a response directly, inclusion of an email address is required. More information about land acknowledgment is available on the website. Interested individuals can sign up to receive updates about application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, and tours. The contact details for the centre are: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@georgebrown.ca.

The information contained in the website is subject to change without notice and should not be considered as a representation, offer or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
